songs.title: Check In (Intro)
songs.lyrics:
[Kevin McCall]
Can I be there for you?
Can I be there for you?

You ready?

Check you in

Glad that u can make it

You know what to do
I said, you know what to do

You know what to do

When you

Check in to your room

You know what to do, when you

Check into that room

We be in room 354

We be in room 354

You ready?

Check you in
